heading: Bruderhof Communities.
general-note: Here are entered works on the communal movement founded by Eberhard Arnold in the early 20th century, known as the Bruderhof, Society of Brothers, or Hutterian Brethren. Works on the Hutterite communities originating in the Anabaptist movement of the 16th century are entered under. Hutterian Brethren..
